sentences.en: And to top this eco theme off, all materials are biodegradable or recyclable.
sentences.cn: 为了彻头彻尾体现节能环保概念, 所有的材料都是可降解可回收的.

sentences.en: Are L'il Critters product bottles recyclable?
sentences.cn: 小熊的瓶子是否可回收?

sentences.en: ASLA's printed materials, signage and decorations are recycled, recyclable, and printed with soy ink.
sentences.cn: ASLA发放 的印刷材料 、 标牌、装饰物或来自回收材料或可回收, 并且使用豆油油墨打印.

sentences.en: Calgary residents currently can take many recyclable products to neighbourhood green bins for free.
sentences.cn: 现在卡尔加里居民可以把各种可回收的废物拿到社区免费的绿色(分类)箱子里.

sentences.en: F 3 DM dual - mode electric vehicle batteries used in iron, a range of raw materials, non - polluting, recyclable.
sentences.cn: F3DM双模电动车使用的铁电池, 原材料广泛 、 无污染 、 可回收.

sentences.en: Motion Pants is manufactured by recycled fiber and is completely recyclable.
sentences.cn: 用环保纤维材料制造,完全可循环回收.
可回收利用的纸板包装材料

sentences.en: Researchers are developing ways to make plastics as recyclable as metal or glass.
sentences.cn: 研究人员正研究使塑料像金属和玻璃一样可以回收利用的方法.

sentences.en: Sold a unique, eye - catching jet - black 250 mL recyclable aluminum can.
sentences.cn: 产品采用独特 、 亮丽的深黑色可回收铝罐包装,容量为250毫升.

sentences.en: Some plastic and glass bottles are recyclable.
sentences.cn: 有些塑胶和玻璃瓶是可回收的.

sentences.en: That car was said to be 95 percent recyclable or biodegradable.
sentences.cn: 据说这辆车95%的部分可以回收并且可以生物降解.

sentences.en: This metal scrap is also a recyclable material.
sentences.cn: 这些破铜烂铁也是可回收利用的物资呢.

sentences.en: Transition Insulation ? is manufactured from recycled fibers and the garments are fully recyclable.
sentences.cn: 用环保纤维材料制造,衣服是完全可循环回收的.

sentences.en: Use materials that are easily recyclable, reusable, renewable, durable, affordable and low maintenance.
sentences.cn: 使用的材料是容易回收, 可重复使用, 可再生, 经久耐用, 价格适中,低维护.

sentences.en: Yes. We use only # 1 and # 2 recyclable bottles and they are BPA Free.
sentences.cn: 是的.我们只使用 # 1和 # 2的可回收瓶,而且是不含双酚A( BPA)的.

sentences.en: You can buy a new electric tea kettle featuring easy - to - dismember recyclable parts.
sentences.cn: 你可以买到一把新的电茶壶,它的特点是能够轻易分解成可回收的部件.

words.tran_cn: 回收；再循环利用（recycle的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: used materials or substances that are recyclable can be recycled
